name: CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom.small
initialProofState:
C : Type u‚ÇÅ
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÅ, u‚ÇÅ} C
W : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
X Y : C
self : CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W X Y
‚ä¢ Small.{w, max u‚ÇÅ v‚ÇÅ} (Quiver.Hom (W.Q.obj X) (W.Q.obj Y))
decl:
/-- This property holds if the type of morphisms between `X` and `Y`
in the localized category with respect to `W : MorphismProperty C`
is small. -/
class HasSmallLocalizedHom : Prop where
  small : Small.{w} (W.Q.obj X ‚ü∂ W.Q.obj Y)

name: CategoryTheory.Localization.hasSmallLocalizedHom_iff
initialProofState:
C : Type u‚ÇÅ
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÅ, u‚ÇÅ} C
W : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
D : Type u‚ÇÇ
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÇ, u‚ÇÇ} D
L : CategoryTheory.Functor C D
inst‚úù : L.IsLocalization W
X Y : C
‚ä¢ Iff (CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W X Y) (Small.{w, v‚ÇÇ} (Quiver.Hom (L.obj X) (L.obj Y)))
decl:
lemma hasSmallLocalizedHom_iff :
    HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W X Y ‚Üî Small.{w} (L.obj X ‚ü∂ L.obj Y) := by
  constructor
  ¬∑ intro h
    have := h.small
    exact small_map (homEquiv W W.Q L).symm
  ¬∑ intro h
    exact ‚ü®small_map (homEquiv W W.Q L)‚ü©

name: CategoryTheory.Localization.hasSmallLocalizedHom_of_isLocalization
initialProofState:
C : Type u‚ÇÅ
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÅ, u‚ÇÅ} C
W : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
D : Type u‚ÇÇ
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÇ, u‚ÇÇ} D
L : CategoryTheory.Functor C D
inst‚úù : L.IsLocalization W
X Y : C
‚ä¢ CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W X Y
decl:
include L in
lemma hasSmallLocalizedHom_of_isLocalization :
    HasSmallLocalizedHom.{v‚ÇÇ} W X Y := by
  rw [hasSmallLocalizedHom_iff W L]
  infer_instance

name: CategoryTheory.Localization.small_of_hasSmallLocalizedHom
initialProofState:
C : Type u‚ÇÅ
inst‚úù¬≥ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÅ, u‚ÇÅ} C
W : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
D : Type u‚ÇÇ
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÇ, u‚ÇÇ} D
L : CategoryTheory.Functor C D
inst‚úù¬π : L.IsLocalization W
X Y : C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W X Y
‚ä¢ Small.{w, v‚ÇÇ} (Quiver.Hom (L.obj X) (L.obj Y))
decl:
variable (X Y) in
lemma small_of_hasSmallLocalizedHom [HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W X Y] :
    Small.{w} (L.obj X ‚ü∂ L.obj Y) := by
  rwa [‚Üê hasSmallLocalizedHom_iff W]

name: CategoryTheory.Localization.hasSmallLocalizedHom_iff_of_isos
initialProofState:
C : Type u‚ÇÅ
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÅ, u‚ÇÅ} C
W : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
X Y X' Y' : C
e : CategoryTheory.Iso X X'
e' : CategoryTheory.Iso Y Y'
‚ä¢ Iff (CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W X Y) (CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W X' Y')
decl:
lemma hasSmallLocalizedHom_iff_of_isos {X' Y' : C} (e : X ‚âÖ X') (e' : Y ‚âÖ Y') :
    HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W X Y ‚Üî HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W X' Y' := by
  simp only [hasSmallLocalizedHom_iff W W.Q]
  exact small_congr (Iso.homCongr (W.Q.mapIso e) (W.Q.mapIso e'))

name: CategoryTheory.Localization.hasSmallLocalizedHom_iff_target
initialProofState:
C : Type u‚ÇÅ
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÅ, u‚ÇÅ} C
W : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
X Y Y' : C
f : Quiver.Hom Y Y'
hf : W f
‚ä¢ Iff (CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W X Y) (CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W X Y')
decl:
variable (X) in
lemma hasSmallLocalizedHom_iff_target {Y Y' : C} (f : Y ‚ü∂  Y') (hf : W f):
    HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W X Y ‚Üî HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W X Y' := by
  simp only [hasSmallLocalizedHom_iff W W.Q]
  exact small_congr (Iso.homCongr (Iso.refl _) (Localization.isoOfHom W.Q W f hf))

initialProofState:

‚ä¢ Iff (CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W X Y) (CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W X' Y)
decl:
lemma hasSmallLocalizedHom_iff_source {X' : C} (f : X ‚ü∂  X') (hf : W f) (Y : C) :
    HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W X Y ‚Üî HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W X' Y := by
  simp only [hasSmallLocalizedHom_iff W W.Q]
  exact small_congr (Iso.homCongr (Localization.isoOfHom W.Q W f hf) (Iso.refl _))

name: CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.equiv_equiv_symm
initialProofState:
C : Type u‚ÇÅ
inst‚úù‚Åµ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÅ, u‚ÇÅ} C
W : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
D : Type u‚ÇÇ
inst‚úù‚Å¥ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÇ, u‚ÇÇ} D
D' : Type u‚ÇÉ
inst‚úù¬≥ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÉ, u‚ÇÉ} D'
L : CategoryTheory.Functor C D
inst‚úù¬≤ : L.IsLocalization W
L' : CategoryTheory.Functor C D'
inst‚úù¬π : L'.IsLocalization W
G : CategoryTheory.Functor D D'
e : CategoryTheory.Iso (L.comp G) L'
X Y : C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W X Y
f : Quiver.Hom (L.obj X) (L.obj Y)
‚ä¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.equiv W L') ((CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.equiv W L).symm f)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (e.inv.app X) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (G.map f) (e.hom.app Y)))
decl:
lemma equiv_equiv_symm (L : C ‚•§ D) [L.IsLocalization W]
    (L' : C ‚•§ D') [L'.IsLocalization W] (G : D ‚•§ D')
    (e : L ‚ãô G ‚âÖ L') {X Y : C} [HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W X Y]
    (f : L.obj X ‚ü∂ L.obj Y) :
    equiv W L' ((equiv W L).symm f) =
      e.inv.app X ‚â´ G.map f ‚â´ e.hom.app Y := by
  dsimp [equiv]
  rw [Equiv.symm_apply_apply, homEquiv_trans]
  apply homEquiv_eq

name: CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.equiv_mk
initialProofState:
C : Type u‚ÇÅ
inst‚úù¬≥ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÅ, u‚ÇÅ} C
W : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
D : Type u‚ÇÇ
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÇ, u‚ÇÇ} D
L : CategoryTheory.Functor C D
inst‚úù¬π : L.IsLocalization W
X Y : C
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W X Y
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
‚ä¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.equiv W L) (CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.mk W f)) (L.map f)
decl:
@[simp]
lemma equiv_mk (L : C ‚•§ D) [L.IsLocalization W] {X Y : C}
    [HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W X Y] (f : X ‚ü∂ Y) :
    equiv.{w} W L (mk W f) = L.map f := by
  simp [equiv, mk]

name: CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.equiv_mkInv
initialProofState:
C : Type u‚ÇÅ
inst‚úù¬≥ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÅ, u‚ÇÅ} C
W : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
D : Type u‚ÇÇ
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÇ, u‚ÇÇ} D
L : CategoryTheory.Functor C D
inst‚úù¬π : L.IsLocalization W
X Y : C
f : Quiver.Hom Y X
hf : W f
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W X Y
‚ä¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.equiv W L) (CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.mkInv f hf)) (CategoryTheory.Localization.isoOfHom L W f hf).inv
decl:
@[simp]
lemma equiv_mkInv (L : C ‚•§ D) [L.IsLocalization W] {X Y : C} (f : Y ‚ü∂ X) (hf : W f)
    [HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W X Y] :
    equiv.{w} W L (mkInv f hf) = (Localization.isoOfHom L W f hf).inv := by
  simp only [equiv, mkInv, Equiv.symm_trans_apply, Equiv.symm_symm, homEquiv_symm_apply,
    Equiv.trans_apply, Equiv.symm_apply_apply, homEquiv_isoOfHom_inv]

name: CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.equiv_comp
initialProofState:
C : Type u‚ÇÅ
inst‚úù‚Åµ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÅ, u‚ÇÅ} C
W : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
D : Type u‚ÇÇ
inst‚úù‚Å¥ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÇ, u‚ÇÇ} D
L : CategoryTheory.Functor C D
inst‚úù¬≥ : L.IsLocalization W
X Y Z : C
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W X Y
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W Y Z
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W X Z
Œ± : CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom W X Y
Œ≤ : CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom W Y Z
‚ä¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.equiv W L) (Œ±.comp Œ≤)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp ((CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.equiv W L) Œ±) ((CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.equiv W L) Œ≤))
decl:
lemma equiv_comp (L : C ‚•§ D) [L.IsLocalization W] {X Y Z : C} [HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W X Y]
    [HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W Y Z] [HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W X Z]
    (Œ± : SmallHom.{w} W X Y) (Œ≤ : SmallHom.{w} W Y Z) :
    equiv W L (Œ±.comp Œ≤) = equiv W L Œ± ‚â´ equiv W L Œ≤ := by
  letI := small_of_hasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W W.Q X Y
  letI := small_of_hasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W W.Q Y Z
  obtain ‚ü®Œ±, rfl‚ü© := (equivShrink _).surjective Œ±
  obtain ‚ü®Œ≤, rfl‚ü© := (equivShrink _).surjective Œ≤
  dsimp [equiv, comp]
  rw [Equiv.symm_apply_apply]
  erw [(equivShrink _).symm_apply_apply, (equivShrink _).symm_apply_apply]
  simp only [homEquiv_refl, homEquiv_comp]

name: CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.mk_comp_mk
initialProofState:

W : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C

inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W X Z
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
g : Quiver.Hom Y Z
‚ä¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.mk W f).comp (CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.mk W g)) (CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.mk W (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp f g))
decl:
lemma mk_comp_mk [HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W X Y] [HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W Y Z]
    [HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W X Z] (f : X ‚ü∂ Y) (g : Y ‚ü∂ Z) :
    (mk W f).comp (mk W g) = mk W (f ‚â´ g) :=
  (equiv W W.Q).injective (by simp [equiv_comp])

name: CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.comp_assoc
initialProofState:
C : Type u‚ÇÅ
inst‚úù‚Å∂ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÅ, u‚ÇÅ} C
W : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C
X Y Z T : C
inst‚úù‚Åµ : CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W X Y
inst‚úù‚Å¥ : CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W X Z
inst‚úù¬≥ : CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W X T
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W Y Z
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W Y T
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W Z T
Œ± : CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom W X Y
Œ≤ : CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom W Y Z
Œ≥ : CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom W Z T
‚ä¢ Eq ((Œ±.comp Œ≤).comp Œ≥) (Œ±.comp (Œ≤.comp Œ≥))
decl:
@[simp]
lemma comp_assoc [HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W X Y] [HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W X Z]
    [HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W X T] [HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W Y Z]
    [HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W Y T] [HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W Z T]
    (Œ± : SmallHom.{w} W X Y) (Œ≤ : SmallHom.{w} W Y Z) (Œ≥ : SmallHom.{w} W Z T) :
    (Œ±.comp Œ≤).comp Œ≥ = Œ±.comp (Œ≤.comp Œ≥) := by
  apply (equiv W W.Q).injective

name: CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.equiv_chgUniv
initialProofState:

inst‚úù¬≤ : L.IsLocalization W

inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W X Y
e : CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom W X Y
‚ä¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.equiv W L) (CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.chgUniv e)) ((CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.equiv W L) e)
decl:
lemma equiv_chgUniv (L : C ‚•§ D) [L.IsLocalization W] {X Y : C}
    [HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w} W X Y] [HasSmallLocalizedHom.{w''} W X Y]
    (e : SmallHom.{w} W X Y) :

name: CategoryTheory.LocalizerMorphism.equiv_smallHomMap
initialProofState:
C‚ÇÅ : Type u‚ÇÅ
inst‚úù‚Å∑ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÅ, u‚ÇÅ} C‚ÇÅ
W‚ÇÅ : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C‚ÇÅ
C‚ÇÇ : Type u‚ÇÇ
inst‚úù‚Å∂ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÇ, u‚ÇÇ} C‚ÇÇ
W‚ÇÇ : CategoryTheory.MorphismProperty C‚ÇÇ
D‚ÇÅ : Type u‚ÇÉ
inst‚úù‚Åµ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÉ, u‚ÇÉ} D‚ÇÅ
D‚ÇÇ : Type u‚ÇÑ
inst‚úù‚Å¥ : CategoryTheory.Category.{v‚ÇÑ, u‚ÇÑ} D‚ÇÇ
Œ¶ : CategoryTheory.LocalizerMorphism W‚ÇÅ W‚ÇÇ
L‚ÇÅ : CategoryTheory.Functor C‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÅ
inst‚úù¬≥ : L‚ÇÅ.IsLocalization W‚ÇÅ
L‚ÇÇ : CategoryTheory.Functor C‚ÇÇ D‚ÇÇ
inst‚úù¬≤ : L‚ÇÇ.IsLocalization W‚ÇÇ
X Y : C‚ÇÅ
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W‚ÇÅ X Y
inst‚úù : CategoryTheory.Localization.HasSmallLocalizedHom W‚ÇÇ (Œ¶.functor.obj X) (Œ¶.functor.obj Y)
G : CategoryTheory.Functor D‚ÇÅ D‚ÇÇ
e : CategoryTheory.Iso (Œ¶.functor.comp L‚ÇÇ) (L‚ÇÅ.comp G)
f : CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom W‚ÇÅ X Y
‚ä¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.equiv W‚ÇÇ L‚ÇÇ) (Œ¶.smallHomMap f)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (e.hom.app X) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (G.map ((CategoryTheory.Localization.SmallHom.equiv W‚ÇÅ L‚ÇÅ) f)) (e.inv.app Y)))
decl:
lemma equiv_smallHomMap (G : D‚ÇÅ ‚•§ D‚ÇÇ) (e : Œ¶.functor ‚ãô L‚ÇÇ ‚âÖ L‚ÇÅ ‚ãô G)
    (f : SmallHom.{w} W‚ÇÅ X Y) :
    (SmallHom.equiv W‚ÇÇ L‚ÇÇ) (Œ¶.smallHomMap f) =
      e.hom.app X ‚â´ G.map (SmallHom.equiv W‚ÇÅ L‚ÇÅ f) ‚â´ e.inv.app Y := by
  obtain ‚ü®g, rfl‚ü© := (SmallHom.equiv W‚ÇÅ W‚ÇÅ.Q).symm.surjective f
  simp only [smallHomMap, Equiv.apply_symm_apply]
  let G' := Œ¶.localizedFunctor W‚ÇÅ.Q W‚ÇÇ.Q
  let Œ≤ := CatCommSq.iso Œ¶.functor W‚ÇÅ.Q W‚ÇÇ.Q G'
  let E‚ÇÅ := (uniq W‚ÇÅ.Q L‚ÇÅ W‚ÇÅ).functor
  let Œ±‚ÇÅ : W‚ÇÅ.Q ‚ãô E‚ÇÅ ‚âÖ L‚ÇÅ := compUniqFunctor W‚ÇÅ.Q L‚ÇÅ W‚ÇÅ
  let E‚ÇÇ := (uniq W‚ÇÇ.Q L‚ÇÇ W‚ÇÇ).functor
  let Œ±‚ÇÇ : W‚ÇÇ.Q ‚ãô E‚ÇÇ ‚âÖ L‚ÇÇ := compUniqFunctor W‚ÇÇ.Q L‚ÇÇ W‚ÇÇ
  rw [SmallHom.equiv_equiv_symm W‚ÇÅ W‚ÇÅ.Q L‚ÇÅ E‚ÇÅ Œ±‚ÇÅ,
    SmallHom.equiv_equiv_symm W‚ÇÇ W‚ÇÇ.Q L‚ÇÇ E‚ÇÇ Œ±‚ÇÇ]
  change Œ±‚ÇÇ.inv.app _ ‚â´ E‚ÇÇ.map (Œ≤.hom.app X ‚â´ G'.map g ‚â´ Œ≤.inv.app Y) ‚â´ _ = _
  let Œ≥ : G' ‚ãô E‚ÇÇ ‚âÖ E‚ÇÅ ‚ãô G := liftNatIso W‚ÇÅ.Q W‚ÇÅ (W‚ÇÅ.Q ‚ãô G' ‚ãô E‚ÇÇ) (W‚ÇÅ.Q ‚ãô E‚ÇÅ ‚ãô G) _ _
    ((Functor.associator _ _ _).symm ‚â™‚â´ isoWhiskerRight Œ≤.symm E‚ÇÇ ‚â™‚â´
      Functor.associator _ _ _ ‚â™‚â´ isoWhiskerLeft _ Œ±‚ÇÇ ‚â™‚â´ e ‚â™‚â´
      isoWhiskerRight Œ±‚ÇÅ.symm G ‚â™‚â´ Functor.associator _ _ _)
  have hŒ≥ : ‚àÄ (X : C‚ÇÅ), Œ≥.hom.app (W‚ÇÅ.Q.obj X) =
      E‚ÇÇ.map (Œ≤.inv.app X) ‚â´ Œ±‚ÇÇ.hom.app (Œ¶.functor.obj X) ‚â´
        e.hom.app X ‚â´ G.map (Œ±‚ÇÅ.inv.app X) := fun X ‚Ü¶ by
    simp [Œ≥, id_comp, comp_id]
  simp only [Functor.map_comp, assoc]
  erw [‚Üê NatIso.naturality_1 Œ≥]
  simp only [Functor.comp_map, ‚Üê cancel_epi (e.inv.app X), ‚Üê cancel_epi (G.map (Œ±‚ÇÅ.hom.app X)),
    ‚Üê cancel_epi (Œ≥.hom.app (W‚ÇÅ.Q.obj X)), assoc, Iso.inv_hom_id_app_assoc,
    ‚Üê Functor.map_comp_assoc, Iso.hom_inv_id_app, Functor.map_id, id_comp,
    Iso.hom_inv_id_app_assoc]
  simp only [hŒ≥, assoc, ‚Üê Functor.map_comp_assoc, Iso.inv_hom_id_app,
    Functor.map_id, id_comp, Iso.hom_inv_id_app_assoc,
    Iso.inv_hom_id_app_assoc, Iso.hom_inv_id_app, Functor.comp_obj, comp_id]
